name: Result
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Result
description:
Result

A speech recognition result corresponding to a portion of the audio.

See Project#recognize and Job#results.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/speech"

speech = Google::Cloud::Speech.new

audio = speech.audio "path/to/audio.raw",
                     encoding: :raw, sample_rate: 16000
results = audio.recognize

result = results.first
result.transcript #=> "how old is the Brooklyn Bridge"
result.confidence #=> 0.9826789498329163

methods.name: transcript
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Result#transcript
methods.description: Transcript text representing the words that the user spoke.

methods.name: confidence
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Result#confidence
methods.description: The confidence estimate between 0.0 and 1.0. A higher number means the system is more confident that the recognition is correct. This field is typically provided only for the top hypothesis. A value of 0.0 is a sentinel value indicating confidence was not set.

methods.name: alternatives
title: Google
Cloud
Speech
Result#alternatives
methods.description: Additional recognition hypotheses (up to the value specified in max_alternatives). The server may return fewer than max_alternatives.
